description: Change of use from professional services to restaurant and elevational alterations.
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p><span data-sheets-root="1" data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;The use hereby permitted may only be carried out between (    )hours and (    ) hours Mondays to Saturdays and not at all on Sundays/Bank Holidays.\n\nREASON: To ensure that the use operates in a satisfactory manner and does not unduly disturb adjoining occupiers or prejudice local amenity generally.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:15299,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:16776960},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:3,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">The restaurant use hereby permitted may only be carried out between the hours of </span><span id="docs-internal-guid-984fdc32-7fff-f4d1-3896-1ea8954927b1"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">11:00 - 23:00 Monday to Saturday and between the hours of 11:00 - 22:00 on Sundays and Bank Holidays.</span></span><br><br><span style="font-size: 14px;">REASON: To ensure that the use operates in a satisfactory manner and does not unduly disturb adjoining occupiers or prejudice local amenities generally.</span></span><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation, full details of a scheme of ventilation and extraction for the cooking of hot food in the kitchen hereby approved, using cook line equipment and </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Purified Air recirculation system, </span><font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 14.6667px; white-space-collapse: preserve;">shall be submitted to</span></font><span id="docs-internal-guid-a4e73071-7fff-0975-7f29-14a41257b20e"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> and approved by </span></span><font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 14.6667px; white-space-collapse: preserve;">the local planning authority in writing</span></font><span style="font-size: 14.6667px; white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">. The approved details shall be implemented in full and retained whilst the use is in operation.  </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14.6667px; white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-46cdfaf4-7fff-9c1c-d69c-b45320b540b8"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To protect the amenities of adjoining occupiers and the surrounding area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 8pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Any plant shall be installed, together with any associated ancillary equipment, so as to prevent the transmission of noise and vibration into neighbouring premises. The rated noise level from all plant and ancillary equipment shall not exceed the existing background sound level (LA90,15mins) when measured (LAeq,15mins) 1 metre external from the nearest residential or noise sensitive premises. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 8pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">An assessment of the expected noise levels shall be carried out by a suitably qualified (IOA accredited) and experienced acoustic consultant, in accordance with BS 4142:2014+A1:2019 ‘Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound,’ along with any mitigation measures necessary to achieve the above required noise levels and shall be submitted to the local planning authority in writing for approval within 1 month of the use commencing. The plant shall thereafter be installed and maintained in accordance with the approved details.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ea1ff345-7fff-3b5f-a06e-0a2afdd351b3"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason: To protect the amenities of adjoining occupiers and the surrounding area.</span></p>
